## Description {#details}

RegisterPass&lt;t&gt; template - This template class is used to notify the system that a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> is available for use, and registers it into the internal database maintained by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager">PassManager</a>.

Unless this template is used, opt, for example will not be able to see the pass and attempts to create the pass will fail. This template is used in the follow manner (at global scope, in your .cpp file):

static RegisterPass&lt;YourPassClassName&gt; tmp(&quot;passopt&quot;, &quot;My Pass Name&quot;);

This statement will cause your pass to be created by calling the default constructor exposed by the pass.

Definition at line 107 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h">PassSupport.h</a>.
